feed.title: Recyclarr Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Recyclarr: v7.2.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Quality Definition: Support new quality upper limits for Sonarr (1000) and Radarr (2000). This is a backward compatible change, so older versions of Sonarr and Radarr will continue to use the correct upper limits.

entry.title: New release for Recyclarr: v7.2.3
entry.content:
Changed

  • Performance: Reduced the number of API calls to obtain service version information.

Fixed

  • Custom Format: The error "CF field of type False is not supported" no longer occurs when syncing some language-specific custom formats (#318).

entry.title: New release for Recyclarr: v7.2.4
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Custom Formats: Smarter change detection logic for custom formats with language specifications, which addresses the issue of some CFs constantly showing as updated during sync even if they didn't change.

entry.title: New release for Recyclarr: v7.3.0
entry.content:
Added

  • Notifications support through Apprise

Fixed

  • A DependencyResolutionException is no longer raised in some commands (e.g. list) (#352).

entry.title: New release for Recyclarr: v7.4.0
entry.content:
Added

  • Notifications: New verbosity setting for Notifications to control the frequency and content of notifications sent after sync operations (#354).

Fixed

  • Repositories: Show a warning when there's a git fetch failure (#355).
